General.Name: Sabre Resources Limited
General.Description: Sabre Resources Limited explores for and develops mineral properties in Australia and Namibia. The company primarily explores for copper, lead, zinc, uranium, nickel sulphide, vanadium, cobalt, silver, gold, and other base metal deposits. Its flagship project is the Sherlock Bay project located in the Pilbara region of Western Australia. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 8 Parliament Place, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
